text: Sergio Renán (30 January 1933 - 13 June 2015) was an Argentine actor, movie director and screenwriter. He is known for his movies Manon (1984), Rigoletto (1985), Othello (1987), Madame Butterfly (1989), Cosi Fan Tutte (1990), and The Marriage of Figaro (1992). He was born in Buenos Aires to a Jewish family. Renán died from pneumonia at a hospital in Buenos Aires, aged 82. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1933 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Argentine screenwriters Category:Argentine movie directors Category:Actors from Buenos Aires Category:Writers from Buenos Aires
title: Sergio Renán
